posts.post_title: WTB: T3 Turkey Red Nap Lajoie
posts.post_content:
I’m hoping to find a low-graded (PSA or SGC) T3 Turkey Red Nap Lajoie.
My focus is decent front image eye appeal ... a pinhole and edge/corner/back wear are okay.
Thanks for reading.
Andy
